### Session Slide Decks (HTML)

| File | Slides | Status |
|------|--------|--------|
| `sessions/day-01/slides-day01-morning.html` | 10 slides | ✓ Success |
| `sessions/day-01/slides-day01-afternoon.html` | 12 slides | ✓ Success |
| `sessions/day-02/slides-day02-morning.html` | 11 slides | ✓ Success |

**Features:**
- Self-contained HTML with inline CSS
- JetBrains Mono typography (Google Fonts)
- Keyboard navigation (arrows, space, page up/down, home/end)
- Click navigation (left 30% = back, right 30% = forward)
- Tier 1 branding (`<mdp>` Health Design Sprint)
- Speaker notes in HTML comments
- MDP mood backgrounds (warm, cool, energy, dark)
